name: A Little Cup of Friendship v2
description:
✨MY FIRST DROP✨
🌈Special Edition🌈
My first NFT!
A nostalgic moments that can't be repeated today, the moment when I can play with my childhood friends. Doing funny things, make a tea party and build our wonderland together. This artwork was created because of my anxiety about the condition of children in the pandemic era who can't have free mobility in study activity nor playing activities.

actual size: 100 x 65 cm
media: acrylic on plywood
techique: plaque & pen stroke for shading

dimention: 4032 x 2628 px
phisical artwork with digital process

https://twitter.com/arumwill_
